titleStmt.title: Tiruvakkarai [Vakkarai - TO30], X temple, time of X, year X

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

handDesc.p: No distinction between e and ē, nor between o and ō.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.p:
||◯|| ś=rī s=vas=ti ś=rī [||*] tirumakaḷ polapperunilaccelviyuntaṉa
kke Urimai pūṇṭamai maṉakkoḷakkāntalūrccālai kalamaṟuttaruḷi ve
ṅkaināṭuṅkaṅkapāṭiyunuḷampapāṭi taṭikaivaḻiyum kuṭamalaināṭum
kollamuṅkaliṅkamum tiṇṭiṟal veṉṟittaṇṭāṟkkoṇṭu taṉṉe/
ḻil vaḷar Ūḻiyellāyāṇṭuntoḻutakai viḷaṅkum yāṇṭey ceḻiyaraittecukoḷ ś=rīkorājarājarājakesaripan=maṟk
ku yāṇṭu 16 Āvatu ś=rīkaṇṭarāti[t*]tatevar nampirāṭṭiyār ś=rīUttama-coḻaraittiruvayiṟu vāytta uṭaiyapirāṭṭiyār cempiyaṉmāteviyār
Eṭuppittaruḷiṉa ś=rītiruvakkarai tirukkaṟṟaḷi civalokam(m)Uṭaiya paramas=vāmikaḷukku tevatāṉamāka ceyta Ūr Oymānāṭṭu Āṉmurnāṭṭu maṇali Ūrār rāja
kesariyālaṭṭakkaṭava pañcavāra(ṉ)ṉe[l*]lu Āyirakkāṭi paḷḷippeṟu toṇṇūṟṟu Aṟu kāṭi mukkāl yivai kāṭi kalamākkiya
(ṉ)ṉellu muṉṉūṟṟuAṟupattuAiyṅkalaṉe Eḻu kuṟuṇi Ivai t=ribhuvanamahādevi poṟ(k)kāl ṉālāyiravaṉoṭo
kkum civaloka(ṉ)ṉāṉa marakkālāl kalattuvāy Aiyṅkuṟuṇi vāci Eṟuṉe[l*]lu ṉūṟ
ṟu Aiympattuyiru kalaṉe tūṇi Āka vāciyeṟṟi civalokaṉāṉa marakkālāl
mutalāṉa ṉe[l*]lu AiñṉūṟṟorupattuEḻu kalaṉe Iru tūṇi mukkuṟuṇi Ivaṟṟu
ḷ maṇaliyiṉinṟum tiruvakkaraikku Eṭutta Eruttu[k*]kūli poti Oṉṟiṉāl ṉe[l*]lu Iru kala
ṉey tūṇi patakku Eruttukkūli patakkākaṉūṟṟuttoṇṇūṟṟuṉālu Erut
tukku Eruttukkūli niṅkuṉellu muppattiru kalaṉe tūṇi nīkki tiruvakkarai tirukkoyilukku vantu civalokaṉāṉa marakkālāl mutalāṉaṉellu nāṉūṟṟeṇpattaiṅkalaṉeyeḻu kuṟuṇi meṟppaṭi tevatāṉa maṇali Ūṟār Iṭakkaṭava kācuniṟaikkallāl poṉ Onpatiṉ kaḻañceyarai
Araikkāl Itu Araivāciyeṟṟi kācuniṟaikkallāl Iṭakkaṭava tuḷainiṟai poṉ patiṉmukkaḻañcaraiye mūṉṟu mañcāṭiyum Āṟu mā Ippoṉ kācukallāl Aḻikkavum Iṉṉellu civalokaṉāṉa marakkālāl ṉellaṭṭavum nivaṉtam ceytapaṭi Āṇṭārkku tiruAmutu mūṉṟu san=tikkum
Arici kuṟuṇiṉānāḻiyāka ku[ṟ*]ṟu[k*]kūli Uḷppaṭa Aiñciraṇṭu vaṇṇattāl ṉellu mukkuṟuṇi Aṟu nāḻiyum kaṟiA[mu*]tu mūṉṟu san=tikku miḷakupoṭikku tiṅkaḷ po
ṉ kuṉṟiyāka Orāṇṭaikku poṉ Āṟu mañcāṭiyum tayirAmutu muṉṟu san=tikkum tayiramutuṉāṭurikkuṉṉe[l*]lu muṉṉāḻiyum Aṭaikkāyamutukku muṉṟu san=tikkumāka veṟumilaikkuṉe[l*]lu-ṉāḻiyum veṟum pākku mūṉṟu san=tikku patinañcukku tiṅkaḷ poṉ kuṉṟiyāka Orāṇṭaikku kācukallāl poṉ
Āṟu mañcāṭiyum ś=rīpali Eḻuttaruḷa Irāvaikku paliAricikkuṉellu Uriyum tiruvārātiṉai ce[y*]yumṉampikku nicatiṉelluk=kuṟuṇi Eḻu ṉāḻi Āṇṭuvarai kappaṭattuk=ku kācukallāl poṉ Araikkaḻañcum tiruUṇṇāḻiyyai pariyārañceyumāṇiyaḷ Iruvarkkuṉellu nicataṅkuṟuṇi nāṉāḻiyum
Uvaccakaḷ talaippaṟai koṭṭuvāṉ Oruvaṉukku kuṟuṇi Uṭppaṭa Uvaccakaḷ ṉāl
var[k*]ku nicatanellu mukkuṟuṇi Iru nāḻiyum tiruppatiyam pāṭuvār Iruvar[k*]ku nicata
ne[l*]lu patakkum Āṇṭuvarai kappaṭattukku kācukallālppoṉ kaḻañcum tirunaṉ
tavāṉañce[y*]tu tiruppaḷḷittāmamum paṟippāṉukku nicataṉellu kuṟuṇiyum Āṇṭu
varai kappaṭattukku kācukallālppon Oṉpatiṉ mañcāṭiyum tiruAlakum tirumeḻu
kkum Iṭṭu tiruppaḷḷittāmam toṭuppāḷukku nicataṉellu muṉṉāḻiyum Āṇṭuvarai
kappaṭattukku poṉ kācukallāl ṉālu mañcāṭiyum ś=rīkāriyañceyvārk-kuṉ ne[l*]lu
kuṟuṇiyum saṃk=rāntikaḷum maṟṟum s=napanaṅkaḷum kala-caṅkaḷum maṟṟuñcālka
ḷum kuṭaṅkaḷum peruntiruvamutukku pāṉaikaḷum caṭṭikaḷum tīrumuḷaikkuppālikai
kaḷum Iṭuṅkucavaṉukku nicatanṉellu munṉāḻiyum tiruppari-caṭṭaṅkaḷ Uṭppaṭa
maṟṟum paricaṭṭakamuvveṇṭuvaṉakamuvum paricaṭṭaṅkoḷḷikku nicatanṉelluṉāḻiyum Āka
Oruṉāḷaikkuṉellu kalaṉe tūṇi Oruṉāḻiyuriyāka Orāṇṭaikkumāka ṉe[l*]luṉāṉūṟṟeṇpa
ttaiṅkalaṉe Eḻu kuṟuṇiṉāṉāḻiṉe[l*]luṉer Āka miḷakukkum veṟuṅkāykkum nivan=taṅ
kaṭavārkku kācukallāl cilavāṉa poṉ Iru kaḻañce mukkālum tirumeyppūccu can=taṉattukku
tiṅkaḷ poṉ mañcāṭiyāka Orāṇṭaikku poṉ kācukallāl Araik-kaḻañceyiraṇṭu mañcāṭiyum
citārikku tiṅkaḷ poṉ kuṉṟiyāka Orāṇṭaikku kācukallāl po[ṉ*]ṉāṟu mañcāṭiyum nontāviḷak
konṟukku nicataneyUḻakkum tiruvamutukku muṉṟu san=tikkum neyUḻakkāḻākkum san=ti
viḷakkuppatiṉṉeṭṭukkuṉeyUḻakkāḻākkum mūṉṟu san=tik=ku ś=rīpalikku cuṟṟuviḷakkukku Āḻākkumāka
nicataṉeyṉāḻi Āḻākkuk=ku Orāṇṭaik=ku kācukallāl poṉ Aṟu kaḻañcaraiyeṉālu mañcāṭiyum tirupparicaṭṭat
tukkum tirunamanikaikkum Uttariyattukkum jalapavi[t*]tirattukku Orāṇṭukku kācukallāl poṉ kaḻañce
Iraṇṭu mañcāṭiyum Uttaramayaṉamum dakṣaṇamayanamum Appiyyaviṣuvum cittiraiviṣuvumaṟṟu
m Iṭukkuvitta g=rāṇamuṇṭākilum s=napaṉa[ñ*]ce[y*]taruḷa perun-tiruvamutukku Uḷappaṭa s=napanattāl kācuka
llāl poṉ Oṉpatu mañcāṭiyāka s=napana Añciṉukku poṉ Iru kaḻañce kālum Āka kācukallāl
This edition by Nicolas Cane (2024), based on autopsy, photographs, and published visual documentation.
